transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.
Executive: Hanji sir, namaste Ravi ji se baat kariye sir.
Customer: Boliye.
Executive: Raju Maurya baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se aapka sir account manager abse mai ho gaya hu.
Customer: Kya mera account manager change ho gaya mera?
Executive: Hanji sir, change change ho gaya hai. To abse aapka account manager mai hu sir.
Customer: Change kyu ho gaya mai wo bol raha hu.
Executive: Sir jo previous wale rahe honge unka kisi aur department me promotion ho gaya hoga isliye account manager abse mai ho gaya hu aapka.
Customer: Accha pehle kaun tha mera account manager?
Executive: Aapke isse pehle account manager Riya Agrawal thi mam.
Customer: Ha to wo bhi change ho gayi?
Executive: Sir unka promotion kisi dusre department me ho gaya hoga isliye jo hai ki aapke liye mai assign kiya gaya hu.
Customer: Mai mai unse hi baat karta hu mujhe wahi account manager chahiye.
Customer: Ye char din hue ne account manager badal diya.
Executive: To sir koi aapko dikkat nahi aayegi mai bhi aapki help karunga support karunga jo bhi aapki chize hongi.
Customer: Kya help karoge bataiye aap meri kaise help karoge?
Executive: Sir jo bhi aapko requirement hogi help ki jaise man lijiye product hoga aapka to product ki categories hai by list hai.
Customer: Wo sab nahi chahiye wo to mujhe aata hai sab aap mujhe lead laga ke do.
Customer: Aapko kya karna hai koi bhi lead aaye to mera reference us party ko bhejo wo party mujhe call karegi.
Customer: Is tarah se kaam kar paoge aap?
Executive: Sir reference koi nahi rehta hai wo lead pe aapko hi kaam karna hota hai aap aap jo hai ki.
Customer: Wo aata hai mai aise to nahi bol raha hu na aata hoga to abhi to bol raha hu gana mai. IndiaMART se char mahine se call aa rahe hai mere pe ye to renew karwane hi nahi wala tha mai to.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Nahi to sir yaha se jo hai ki hum log bas ye karte hai ki buyers ko aapke pass la dete hai.
Customer: Contact aap unse karna hota hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi aisa thodi hota tha char mahine se kaise kaam hota tha to IndiaMART me aise.
Customer: Char mahine se aap partiyo ko reference mera bhej rahe the wo mujhe call kar rahe the wo kaise ho raha tha kaam to phir?
Executive: Sir party ko reference nahi bheja jata hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi mai wahi to bol raha hu yaar tum suno to sahi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Char mahine se mere pe samne se call aa rahe the IndiaMART ke through partiyo ke wo kaise aa rahe the?
Executive: Sir usko inquiry kehte hai dekhiye hum sab business na teen tarike se provide karte hai pehle to by lead wala business ho gaya dusra business ho gaya calls ka aur teesra hota hai inquiries ka to buyers aapko direct call karenge.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Aur wo calls aur inquiries wo usi pe depend karti hai aap lead kis tarah se consume kar rahe hai.
Executive: Aur aapki.
Customer: Mai to regularly consume karunga hi.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Lekin aapki or se samne party ka jab bhi koi inquiry dalta hai equipment sheets ya panel sheets me kisi bhi spices me.
Executive: Ji ji to phir.
Customer: Mere catalog me hai.
Executive: Automatic chala jata hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi mai wahi bol raha hu to unko aap bhejiye to wo hame call kare. Kyuki hum to kaam me hote to kabhi har bar dekh ke nahi baith sakte IndiaMART ki application.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Hum bhi log kuch aur kaam me hote hai to aapko unko hamara reference bhejna padega samne se to us party ne jab inquiry dale to usko pata chalega to bhai ye party baithe yaha pe to usko call kiya jaye.
Executive: Ha ha to sir wo automatic call call kar lenge wo wo jo clients hote hai party jo hoti hai automatic call kar lenge aapko bas aapko.
Customer: Automatic kaise karenge?
Executive: Sir kyuki aapne apni catalog bana kar rakhi hai jo products hai aapne add kar rakhe hai hamare IndiaMART site pe to usi ke base pe sir wo call karte hai catalog visit karne ke baad jaise total aapne 11 item add kiye hue hai.
Executive: Ye isme ajwain hai saunf hai aur ye jeera bhi hai to har tarah ke items hai to usi ko visit karke hi client aapko call karte hai.
Executive: Price agar aapki achi lagi client client ko man lijiye aapne funnel jo Singapore quality wala funnel hai 85 rupees per kg ka rate aapne isme dala hua hai.
Executive: Agar aabhi jaise aur bhi competitors hai to agar man lijiye aapka rate agar client ko achcha laga aapki quality achi lagi to wo aapko call back kar lenge ki ha ji sir hame ye product ki requirement hai.
Customer: Nahi aisa nahi hota aapki or se bhi to usko bheja jata hai.
Customer: Aapke or se bhi usko message bheja jata hai ke party yaha pe baithe aap unko call kar dijiye.
Executive: Nahi sir aisa nahi hota wo inquiry usko bolte hai jo aapko message receive hoga na usko inquiry bolte hai party aapko khud message karegi.
Executive: Aapki catalog visit karne ke baad isliye hum jyada focus karte hai catalog pe catalog jitni achi hogi utni achi calls aayengi utni achi inquiries aayengi sir aapko aur maine.
Customer: To aap catalog thik kijiye sahi kijiye hamari catalog.
Executive: Ji ji to maine sir aapke catalog check karke hi maine aapko call kiya hai catalog mai dekh pa raha hu kafi sahi hai aapki isme koi dikkat nahi hai lekin phir bhi ek bar aap agar online aa sakte hai video meeting ke liye to ek bar mai category aapko show kar dunga mai screen share kar dunga aap bhi dekh lijiyega ki kaun kaun si category.
Customer: Kal dupehar ko call kijiye.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Kal do dupehar ko 1:30 baje call kijiye.
Executive: Accha kal mai 1:30 baje thik hai sir koi baat nahi mai 1:30 baje call karta hu jyada time nahi lunga aapka to aapke samne hi mai apna screen share karunga aur aap usme select kar lijiyega kyuki maximum do categories aap choose kar sakte hai aur kam se kam ek to aapka sab me ek ek bas choose hai.
Customer: Catalog to mai apne aap bana sakta hu bhai mujhe product add karna hai price change karna hai photo add kar sab mujhe aata hai yaar aap log wo kijiye jo ab tak karte the wo char mahine se jo karte the wo kijiye mujhe aap Rakesh ji se mujhe baat karni padegi.
Executive: Sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants the previous account manager.

- Customer says he gets direct calls from buyers.



Resolution:

- Executive informed about promotion of previous manager.

- Executive explained how buyers contact the customer.

- Executive offered a video meeting to review catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 1:30 PM tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, catalog, buyleads, inquiries
